get_binary(MC_COUNT: int) → bytes#

Gets the full binary send package for the motion command.

Parameters:

  • MC_COUNT (int) – The current motion command count.

  • Returns

  • bytes – The full binary send package.

get_header_decimal(MC_COUNT: int) → int#

Gets the header of the motion command in decimal.

Parameters:

MC_COUNT (int) – The current motion command count.

Returns:

The header in decimal.

Return type:

int

set_MC_parameter_value(index: int, MC_value: Any) → None#

Changes a parameter value ensuring that the units are converted to what the drivers expect.
